arts.ttl: He's no Angel! Ex-Man United star Gomes is SENT OFF in first half of Lille's Champions League defeat by Sporting Lisbon - just a week after impressing on full England debut
arts.sum: Gomes' memorable month took a hit initially when he was booked for pushing Sporting's winger Francisco Trincao after 21 minutes before being sent off for a trip on Viktor Gyokeres

arts.ttl: Sporting start Champions League campaign with 2-0 victory over Lille
arts.sum: A goal in each half by Viktor Gyökeres and Zeno Debast got Sporting’s Champions League campaign off to a perfect start in Lisbon tonight against ten-man Lille. The French outfit were proving a tough nut to crack until a fine Gyökeres strike and an Angel Gomes red card in quick succession shortly before half time definitively turned the game in Sporting’s favour. Belgian centre-back Zeno Debast scored a wondergoal in the second half to confirm the three points for the Lions in the new league format of Europe’s premier club competition. More to follow.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Sporting 2-0 Lille: Les Dogues slump to opening loss after Angel Gomes’ early sending-off
arts.sum: Lille OSC made it four losses in a row across all competitions as they capitulated 2-0 to Sporting CP. Lille became the first French team since AS Monaco in the…

arts.sum: Sporting CP get their UEFA Champions League campaign underway on Tuesday night when they will face Ligue 1 side Lille OSC at home. For the encounter, Ruben Amorim will be…

arts.ttl: Sporting CP vs Lille: Preview, predictions and lineups
arts.sum: Portuguese champions Sporting CP face French outfit Lille on the opening night of the Champions League this Tuesday. Sporting have never made it beyond the last 16 of the Champions League but they will be looking to change that this term, especially with in-form sharpshooter Viktor Gyokeres leading the line.

arts.ttl: Papers: Liverpool tracking Lille and England star Gomes
arts.sum: The top stories and transfer rumours from Tuesday's newspapers...

arts.ttl: Gyokeres comments on potential future transfer amid Premier league links
arts.sum: Viktor Gyokeres has commented on his future at Sporting Club de Portugal as rumours about a transfer to the Premier League persist. The Sweden striker has attracted a lot of interest thanks to his exploits in Portugal, scoring 51 goals in 56 appearances since leaving Coventry City in a deal worth up to £21 million. […] The post Gyokeres comments on potential future transfer amid Premier league links first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.sum: Warren Ashurst takes a look at the first round of fixtures in the new format of the Champions League and offers a score prediction for each game..

arts.ttl: Sporting vs Lille predictions: Sporting to be too slick on home turf
arts.sum: Sporting host Lille in the Champions League on Tuesday and James Milton expects the Portuguese champions to turn on the style in Lisbon.
